attributes.action: Allow students to leave school for lunch.
attributes.additional_details: Six-form and college students are allowed to, and with a small age gap between secondary school and college it seems unjustified why school students aren’t allowed.
attributes.background: It would improve behaviour and focus in lesson, as well as making school more realistic in portraying employment. It wouldn’t be mandatory for all students, but it should be another option to give the students freedom in their social time.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.
